custom.header:
{{{{raw}}}}

{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your pickup order was canceled, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}. {{else}} Your order was canceled, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{/is}}

{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your order was canceled because it wasn't picked up. We'll make sure to reverse your claim with your insurer. {{/is}}

custom.survey:
{{{{raw}}}}

Questions on your order?

Check our FAQs . Still have questions? {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}} for any questions. {{else}} Call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}} for any questions. {{/is}}
{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'SPLITFULFILLMENT'}}{{else}}{{/is}}

We're sorry for the inconvenience.

Let us know how we can do better.  

Tell us about your in-store pickup experience

We're piloting in-store pickup. Your feedback can help.  Let us know how we did by taking a short survey.

Tell us about your in-store pickup experience

We're piloting in-store pickup. Your feedback can help.  Let us know how we did by taking a short survey.

What do you think?

Have feedback about ordering from CVS Pharmacy? Take a quick survey to share your thoughts.

custom.returns:
{{{{raw}}}} {{#is attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}}

Need to return a store item?

No problem. Just show this barcode at the register when making your in-store return. See our return policy.
{{else is attributes.order_type 'SPLITFULFILLMENT'}}

Need to return a store item?

No problem. Just show this barcode at the register when making your in-store return. See our return policy.
{{/is}} {{{{/raw}}}}
custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
You received this email to confirm the action noted above. Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please note that At-Home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{else}} If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. {{/is}}

If you have any questions about your order, please {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}}. {{else is attributes.order_type 'BOPIS'}} call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}}. {{else}} email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287. {{/is}}

©Copyright CVS.com
One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895
{{{{/raw}}}}

body.text:
Hi{{#if customer.contact.first_name}} {{{{raw}}}}{{{customer.contact.first_name}}}{{{{/raw}}}}{{/if}},
Thank you for shopping with us.

callout.text: This happens sometimes. The first thing to do is to check the bushes - did ya check the bushes? Always gotta check those bushes.
